column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Thank goodness we 're in time ! "
#Text=Kuei says : " In time for what ? "
#Text=Ty Lee says : " Yeah .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Who ?
#Text=" Toph says : " They 're not the real Kyoshi Warriors !
#Text=" Mai says : " Sorry to disappoint you .
#Text=" Ty Lee says : " Oooh , it 's like we 're dancing together !
#Text=" Azula says : " This fight is over .
#Text=" Azula says : " Get them all out of my sight .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " Now comes the part where I double cross you .
#Text=Dai Li , arrest the Fire Nation princess !
#Text=I said arrest her !
#Text=What is wrong with you ?!
#Text=" Azula says : " It 's because they have n't made up their minds .
#Text=They 're waiting to see how this is going to end .
#Text=" Long Feng says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Azula says : " I can see your whole history in your eyes .
#Text=You were born with nothing , so you 've had to struggle , and connive , and claw your way to power .
#Text=But true power , the divine right to rule , is something you 're born with .
#Text=The fact is , they do n't know which one of us is going to be sitting on that throne , and which one is going to be bowing down .
#Text=But I know , and you know .
#Text=Well ?
#Text=" Long Feng says : " You 've beaten me at my own game .
#Text=" Azula says : " Do n't flatter yourself !
#Text=You were never even a player .
#Text="
